HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
RWP uses some custom priorities that do not exist in vanilla RimWorld to make colonists behave more logically.

You can toggle the use of these custom priorities and read more about them in the menu (via tooltips).

To access the mod's menu, go to Menu > Options > Mod Settings.

- All custom work orders are now individually togglable in the mod's menu.

- Fixed Haul Rottables. Haulers will prioritise the fastest rotting items.

- Fixed Haul Deterioratables. Haulers will prioritise the fastest deteriorating items.

To access the mod's menu, go to Mod Settings in RimWorld's Options menu.
